task.title: Creating Venues
task.abstract:
The Venues object manages the event locations for events:
Conference style events have multiple venue support.
Simple style events have single venue support.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Venues tab in the Events app and click the New button.
step.info: To store the Venue details for future events, create the Venue from the Venues related list on the Event Category record.
Best practices recommend entering a Description and the Image URL.

step.cmd: Enter the necessary Contact & Location details.
step.info: A valid address must be entered in order for the Display Map to work in the Community Portal.

step.cmd: Check the Is Primary Venue checkbox to identify an event's Primary Venue and click the Save button.
step.info: The Is Primary Venue checkbox must be checked in order for the Add to Calendar button to display and the Display Map feature to work in the Community Portal.

taskbody.result: The Venue is linked to the related Event or Event Category.
